member.name: T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs
member.summary: Enumerates the content types for the speaking of elements such as times, dates, and currency.

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.SpellOut
member.summary: Spell the word or phrase. For example, say “clock” as “C L O C K”.

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.NumberOrdinal
member.summary: Speak a number as an ordinal number. For example, speak "3rd" as "third".

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.NumberCardinal
member.summary: Speak a number as a cardinal number. For example, speak "3" as "three".

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.Date
member.summary: Speak a number sequence as a date. For example, speak “05/19/2004” or “19.5.2004” as “may nineteenth two thousand four”.

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.DayMonthYear
member.summary: Speak a number sequence as a date including the day, month, and year. For example, speak “12/05/2004” as “May twelfth two thousand four”.

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.MonthDayYear
member.summary: Speak a number sequence as a date including the day, month, and year. For example, speak “12/05/2004” as “December fifth two thousand four”.

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.YearMonthDay
member.summary: Speak a number sequence as a date including the day, month, and year. For example, speak “2004/05/12” as “May twelfth two thousand four”.

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.YearMonth
member.summary: Speak a number sequence as a year and month. For example, speak “2004/05” as “May two thousand four”.

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.MonthYear
member.summary: Speak a number sequence as a month and year. For example, speak “05/2004” as “May two thousand four”.

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.MonthDay
member.summary: Speak a number sequence as a month and day. For example, speak “05/12” as “may twelfth”, and speak “12/5” as “December 5th”.

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.DayMonth
member.summary: Speak a number sequence as a day and month. For example, speak “12/05” as “May twelfth”, and speak “05/12” as “December 5th”.

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.Year
member.summary: Speak a number as a year. For example, speak “1998” as “nineteen ninety-eight”.

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.Month
member.summary: Speak a word as a month. For example, speak “June” as “June”.

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.Day
member.summary: Speak a number as the day in a date. For example, speak “3rd” as “third”.

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.Time
member.summary: Speak a number sequence as a time. For example, speak “9:45” as “nine forty-five”, and speak “9:45am” as “nine forty-five A M”.

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.Time24
member.summary: Speak a number sequence as a time using the 24-hour clock. For example, speak “18:00” as “eighteen hundred hours”.

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.Time12
member.summary: Speak a number sequence as a time using the 12-hour clock. For example, speak “03:25” as “three twenty-five”.

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.Telephone
member.summary: Speak a number sequence as a U.S. telephone number. For example, speak “(306) 555-1212” as “Area code three zero six five five five one two one two”.

member.name: F:System.Speech.Synthesis.SayAs.Text
member.summary: Speak the word or phrase as text. For example, speak “timeline” as “timeline”.
